content: Launched in February 2023.Web: https://www.2dai.io/dApp & gallery: https://dapp.2dai.io/ (currently in alpha)Twitter: https://twitter.com/2DAICommunityTelegram: https://t.me/Token2dAIContract address: 0x539b4dfcd1e4dc3153e59204004c2141f796f432Buy on UniswapA platform to generate AI images and videos (!), turn them into unique minted NFT and put them on sale. All in a few clicks.A powerful text-to-video and text-to-image AI bot. Right now working on Telegram.Creators contests going on with tokens and NFT prizes.0% Team Tokens0% Private or investor pre-sales1% Tax to liquidity pool2% Tax is allocated to GPU clusters, hosting, marketing & developmentLocked Liquidity.Renounced ownership (any related red flag is inapplicable)NFT creator program.Our prompt-to-mint AI technology allows creators to mint their very own non-fungible tokens (NFTs) on the Ethereum blockchain. With this new technology, you can mint your creative ideas into NFTs by using our different styles and frame shapes. The possibilities are endless, and the potential for creativity and expression is limitless! We believe that the prompt-to-mint AI is a game-changer in the world of NFTs and we intend to use it in multiple ways.Mint your visuals up to 2kLoot a random community NFT for freeShare & Trade it on Opensea.iohttps://i.postimg.cc/7qy3k7Pz/2dai-1.jpg
